title: Relative pose of collisions may be incorrect until Reset World

content.raw:
In the attached world file `spheres.xml`, there is a ground plane, and a model containing two unconnected spheres. `sphere1` has it's c.g., visual, and collision at the origin of the model, while `sphere10` has identical pose offsets for c.g., visual, and collision.

When starting gazebo with this world, `sphere1` will fall and land on the ground as expected, while `sphere10` appears to sink through the ground and swing like a pendulum, popping up periodically.

After performing a World Reset, both spheres behave properly.

[See a video here](https://vimeo.com/54473855).

This manifests in both gazebo_1.3 and default as of this writing.
